Package data

Class Line

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.Line

  • public class Line
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a line of words read by Loader

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,WordGroup> groupedWordsMap
      A Map collection in which key Integer represents the length of each word in a group and value WordGroup is a group of words having the same length.
      private java.lang.String line
      Initial String read by Loader
      private java.util.ArrayList<Word> words
      A list of separate words present in the line

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates new data.Line.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void computeLine​()
      Runs all private methods - splits line into words, groups them by length and counts average number of vowels in each group.
      private void countAverageVowels​()  
      private void groupWordsHMap​()
      Groups words by their length.
      private void split​()
      Splits initial line of text int separate words on whitespace.
